verses.text: Yawé Muitsexi kaniuta'inieni, 'ixuriki tukiyarita 'ayekaiti. Mipai katinitahiawe,
yunaime 'ixaheritsixi mipai mitiwatahiaweki: «Kepauka xeme xewiti 'imikieri mawariyari miyetuani Yawé hetsiemieme, wakaxi yatini muxa pihikitini.
>>Mawari taiyariyari xemiwewieniki xika tewa hikitini miki pu'ukitini 'aixia mi'ane pihikitini, 'ixuriki tukiyari kitenie hixie xekene'atia mawari taiyariyari mayaniki. Yawé muwa kanitanaki'erimiki.
'Ana tita mititimawa hetsie yumamaki mu'uyatsie peutimeni, mitanaki'eriwaki hetsiena mieme meta mixinarieni mawariyari mayaniki.
'Anake Yawé hixie tsikeru mekaniwaxitekuni, mawari wewiwamete 'Aruni niwemama xuriya mekwewieme mawari taiyame 'aurie mepeyeurietikine, 'ixuriki tukiyari kitenie hixie muwetsie.
Meta wakaxi mi'atia kanitakwipiemiki meta tinaime pitiwayewitexiani.
'Aruni niwemama, mawari wewiwamete, mawari taiyametsie kiyexiki mepakanaini,
hiki wai muwitekietika 'aixia mepiteyatsa tai mita'a heima mawari taiyametsie, mu'u nikame meta wiyayari,

kwinurieya meta 'ikateya haki pititihauxinire, miki mawari wewiwame mawari taiyametsie naime pititaiya. Miki mawari naiti taiyariyariekame kanihikitini, 'imikieri taipa kwaxiyariekame witsimu'ia Yawé minake.
>>Xika xewiti mawari taiyariyari 'ixatiani tuuru, yatini muxa 'uki, yatini tsipu 'uki pihikitini 'aixia mi'ane.
Yawé hixie mekaniwaxitekuni mawari taiyame tayeta hepatsie, 'Aruni niwemama mawari wewiwamete xuriya mekwewieme mawari taiyame 'aurie mekaneyeurietikinikuni.
Hiki puwayewitexiani, hiki mawari wewiwame 'aixia katiniyatsamiki kiyexi mitatikatsie heima mawari taiyametsie, mu'u nikame meta wiyayari.

Yaxeikiata kwinurieya meta 'ikateya haki pitihauxinire, hiki mawari wewiwame naime tikuxeirieme mawari taiyametsie pitititaiya. Miki mawari naiti taiyariekame kanihikitini, Yawé mawari miyetuiriyariwa taipa mieme witsimu'ia kanihikitini.
>>>Xika xewiti memite'awiwawe Yawé yetuirieni mawari taiyariyari mayaniki, xeime kukuru yatini xeime haimi pixatiani.
Mawari wewiwame kukuru panutuni mawari taiyametsie mana mu'uya panutiteke, meta mawari taiyametsie pitataiya. Hiki xuriyaya mawari taiyame 'aurie kanayepinamiki,
yaxeikiata 'iniaya kanayehanimiki meta kwinurieya, mawari taiyame 'etsatana tau manatineika hepatsie naxi meukawiwiwatsie paiti kaneiwiwimiki.

Hiki 'anateyatsie tiwieti tawieya kananutaxitemiki 'anateya kawayetsanati. Hiki mawari wewiwame mawari taiyametsie kanitataiyamiki, tai heima. Miki mawari naiti taiyariekame kanihikitini, Yawé mawari miyetuiriyariwa taipa mieme witsimu'ia.
>>Xika xewiti tiriku mawariyari Yawé hetsiemieme yetuamiki, miki tiriku mitixiyari 'aixia mi'ane pihikitini, hetsiena huriwa hatseitiyari peutituani meta 'ikwa witsimu'ia.

Hiki 'Aruni niwemama mawari wewiwamete wahetsia kaniyetuamiki, mana xeimamayari panatituni harina witsimi'ane hatseiti mini'i meta 'ikwa witsimu'ia nikame, hiki mawari wewiwame 'imikieri ma'eriwa mawariyari mawari taiyametsie kanitataiyamiki. Miki mawari Yawé miyetuiriyariwa taipa mieme witsimu'ia kanihikitini.
Tiriku mitixiyari mawariyari muyuhayewa, 'Aruni meta niwemama wahetsiemieme kanayeimiki. Miki 'imikieri taipa warikariekame Yawé hetsia miyetuiya, 'iki pihiki waikawa mipatsie.

>>Kepauka xewiti tiriku mitixiyari mawariyari mukwaxiyarie miyetuani huxunuta mieme, miki paa 'aixia mi'anene pihikitini tikuxanariyame mikani'i, huriwa hatseitiyariki xeikia pihawiyarieka meta paa huriwa hatseitiyari piwiriyarietikani.
>>Xika tiriku mitixiyari mawariyari xakitsie mukwaxiyarie xeyetuani, miki 'imikieri tiriku mitixiyari 'aixia mi'ane pihikitini tikuxanariyame kanikame, hatseitiki xeikia hawiyariekame.
Yayeyeume xepititaraxiani meta hatseiti xepanutituani. Miki tiriku 'imikieri mawariyari mihikiki.
>>Xika tiriku mitixiyari mawariyari xarita kwaxiyariekame pe'ixatiani, miki 'imikieri harina mitixiyari 'aixia mi'ane pihikitini hatseitiki xeikia pihawiyarieka.
Tiriku 'imikieriyari mipai reukuwewiyakame xepi'atiani Yawé hetsia, hiki mawari wewiwame pepiyetuirieni, miki piyianeni mawari taiyametsie miyetuani.
Mawari wewiwame miki 'imikieri yapaimeme 'anatitume mawari ma'eriwa mihikitiniki, mawari taiyametsie pitataiya. Miki 'imikieri Yawé miyetuiriyariwa taipa mieme witsimu'ia kanihikitini.
Tiriku mitixiyari mawariyari muyuhayewa, 'Aruni meta niwemama wahetsiemieme kanayeimiki. Miki 'imikieri taipa warikariekame Yawé hetsia miyetuiya, miki pihiki waikawa mipatsie.
>>>Xeme 'imikieri Yawé xemiyetuirieni tikuxanariyame pikanika, xiete meta tikuxanariyame pikatitaiyariwani miki 'imikieri Yawé miyetuiriyarie taipa mieme mihikiki.
Xiete meta tikuxanariyame Yawé xepite'anutikirieni mawari matiari mieme mayaniki, peru miki mawari taiyametsie xepikatehapineni witsimu'ia hepai.
Naime 'imikieritetsie xemiyetuirieni piti'unamatikani, hatsuaku xekakaiyari tiratuyatsie 'una heuyeweti pikahayeikani. Naime miki 'imikierite piti'unamatikani.
» Xika Yawé 'imikieri matiari tiriku mitikaxuawere xexatiakuni, miki tiriku mihehekwa pihikitini, meta pitixieka yaxeikiata xatitsie pixarikietikani.
Miki 'imikieritetsie huriwa hatseitiyari meta 'ikwa witsimu'ia pepanutituani.

Mawari wewiwame tiriku mihehekwa meta mitixiyari yapaimeme pititaiya mawari ma'eriwa mihikitiniki, huriwa hatseitiyari meta 'ikwa witsimu'ia naime yinikame. Miki 'imikieri taipa mieme Yawé muxatiarie kanihikitini.
Miki 'imikieri taiyariyari, Yawé Muitsexi kemitiuta'aitiakai.
>>Xika xewiti Yawé tuuru yetuirieni 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari, kanixatiamiki 'aixia 'aneme tsepa mitituuru yatini tsepa mitiwakaxi.
Kemi'ane 'imikieri miyetuani miki wakaxi muwaxitekieni mu'uyatsie peutimeni, miranutahakitiretsie 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwe hixie.
Kemi'ane miyetuani Yawé hetsia, 'imikieri taipa kuaxiyariekame, 'iki 'imikieri 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari pihiki: wiya meta kwinuri naime mi'eimatika piyetuirieni,
mumé muhuta wiyayari mi'eimatika, meta wiya katutsitiana mieme, meta wiya nemaya heimana mikawere, miki pirayehapanieni mumé muhuta yinikame.
Hiki 'Aruni niwemama naime 'iki mawari taiyametsie mekatenititaiyakuni, mawari taiyariyari heima matita'a muyekatsie. Miki mawari Yawé miyetuiriyariwa taipa mieme witsimu'ia kanihikitini.
>>Xika mawari 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki miyetuani tuuru hikitini, kemi'ane miyetuani Yawé kaniyetuiriemiki 'aixia 'aneme, tsepa mitiwakaxi yatini mitituuru.
Xika 'imikieri muxa hikitini, Yawé hixie xepiyetuani,
mu'uyatsie putimeni 'anake pimieni 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwe hixie. Hiki 'Aruni niwemama xuriyaya mawari taiyame 'aurie mepayeurietikine.

Kemi'ane mitiyetuani Yawé hetsia 'imikieri taipa kwaxiyariekame, 'iki mawaritsie mieme yamitipaime pitihikitini: wiya meta kwaxieya naimime, (tsutianapaiti kanexitemiki), wiya meta kwinuri naime mi'eimatika piyetuirieni,
mumé muhuta wiyayari mi'eimatika, meta wiya katutsitiana mieme, meta wiya nemaya heimana mikawere, miki pirayehapanieni mumé muhuta yinikame.
Hiki mawari wewiwame miki naime mawari taiyametsie katinititaiyamiki. Miki 'ikwai kanihikitini, mawari taipa warikarieti Yawé hetsia miyetuiwa kanihikitini.
>>Xika tsipu 'uka hikitini mawari 'imikieri mayaniki Yawé hixie piyetuani.
Mu'uyatsie putimeni, 'anake 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwe memanutakika hixie penutixiteni. Hiki 'Aruni niwemama xuriyaya mawari taiyame 'aurie mepayeurietikine.
Kemi'ane mitiyetuani Yawé hetsia 'imikieri taiyariyari, miki pitihikitini: wiya meta kwinuri naime mi'eimatika piyetuirieni,
mumé muhuta wiyayari mi'eimatika, meta wiya katutsitiana mieme, meta wiya nemaya heimana mikawere, miki pirayehapanieni mumé muhuta yinikame.
Hiki mawari wewiwame naime miki mawari taiyametsie katinititaiyamiki. Miki 'imikieri taiyariyari Yawé minake witsimu'ia kanihikitini, miki naiti wiya Yawé hetsia kanimiemetini.
>>'Iki kanihikitikamiki 'aitsika xexiiyarima wahetsie mieme yamemitekahuniki, tsepa hakewa xemetiteni. Xuriya xepikakwa'ani meta wiya.
Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniuta'aitiani

'ixaheritsixi mipai mitiwatahiaweki: «Kepauka xewiti 'atsikatimaiti Yawé 'aitsikayatsie 'axamitiyurieni, tixaitiki kemikareuyewetse xika tiuyurieni, miki 'ipai pita katiniyurimiki: 'Itiyari mawariyari mawari wewiwame hetsiemieme 'axamitiuyuriki
Xika xewiti mawari wewiwame Kakaiyari menayexei 'axatiuyurieni, yunaiti teiteri wahetsie katinahiiyamiki, miki mawari Yawé kaniwewiriemiki tsikeru 'aixia 'aneme kanitimawamiki mi'itiyaniki.
Yawé hixie tsikeru kananuhanimiki, 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwe mirayutixexeiritire pi'atiani miranutakikatiretsie, 'ana tsikeru mu'uyatsie 'utimeti Yawé hixie puwaxiteni.
Mawari wewiwame manayexeiyarie tsikeru xuriyaya yapaimeme kwewieme 'ixuriki tukiyari manuweta paiti penuhana.
Yu'itiwameki xuriyata peukameni, 'anari 'atahutamexia pei'iyaxiani 'ixuriki meuwie hepatsie Yawé hixie.

Hiki mawari wewiwame mawari taiyame 'awateya naukametsie xuriya panuwiriexiani 'ikwa witsimu'ia Yawé hixie muwe, 'ixuriki tukiyarita mirewayutixexeiritire. Hiki tsikeru xuriyaya muyuhayewa mawari taiyame 'ikateyatia pitiyeurieni, 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwe hixie miranutahakitiretsie muwe.
Hiki, tsikeru mumierie 'itiya mawariyari hetsiemieme, naime wiyaya kwinuriteya mi'eimatika mepitehayepini,
mumé muhuta wiyayari mi'eimatika, meta wiya katutsitiana mieme, meta wiya nemaya heimana mikawere, miki pirayehapanieni mumé muhuta yinikame.
Mipai xekateniyurikuni tuuru hetsie 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari wiyaya kexemite'ayepine hepai. Hiki mawari wewiwame naime miki mawari taiyametsie katinititaiyamiki,
peru naiti mitiyuhayewa nawiyari, waiyari, mu'uya, 'ikateya, kwinurite meta kwitaya,

Miki naiti mutiuyuhayewaxi tsikeru hetsie timieme, yateewa paiti xepenuyetuni maku'itiyarietsie, miki naxi matiwiwiwatsie taipa miratitaiyariwatsie xepitiwiwieni naiti mitaxiniki. Naxi matiwiwiwatsie kanitaximiki.
>>Xika yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi 'atsimekatemaiti 'axamete'uyurieni, 'ana yunaiti memiyukuxexeiriwa wahetsie pirahiiyaka Yawé 'aitsikaya kemira'imawa memika'anu'eniki.
Xika kwitiwa miki yameteheyutimani kename 'atsimekatemaiti 'axamete'uyuri, 'ana tsikeru 'aixia mi'ane mekanitimawakuni memi'itiyaniki, 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwe hixie mekanenuhanikuni,
hiki kiekatari 'ukirawetsixi, mana tsikeru mu'uyatsie mekaniutimeikuni, 'ana mekaniwaxitekuni Yawé hixie.
Hiki mawari wewiwame Kakaiyari menayexei, tsikeru xuriyaya yapaimeme kwewieme 'ixuriki tukiyarita paiti penuhana,
yu'itiwameki xuriyata peukameni, 'anari 'atahutamexia pei'iyaxiani 'ixuriki meuwie hepatsie Yawé hixie.

'Arikeketa mawari taiyame 'awateyatsie panuwiriexiani, xuriya 'etsiwa 'ikwa witsimu'ia Yawé hixie muwe, 'ixuriki kiiyarita. Xuriya muyuhayewa mawari taiyame hetia kanitiyeurimiki, 'ixuriki kiiyari manuwe hixie miranutahakitiretsie muwe.
Yaxeikiata mawari wewiwame naime wakaxi wiyayari payetuni, 'ana mawari taiyametsie pitataiya,
Yaxeikia tsikeru hetsie mirayepine xepite'anatipini 'itiya mawariyari xemite'uwewi hepai. Mipai mawari wewiwame miki memi'itiyaniki pitiwewieni wahetsiemieme, miki mepiteheuyehiwiyarieni.

Hiki tsikerutsie timieme mitiyuhayewaxi naime piranuyepini yateewa memakuteitsie taipa pihayewa mitixiniki, xewiti tsikeru kemirayepiniyarie hepai. 'Iki kanihikitini 'itiya mawariyari yunaiti memuyutixexeiriwa wahetsiemieme.
>>Xika xewiti kiekari mihiritiarie 'axatiuyurieni 'atsikatimaiti Yawé xekakaiyari 'aitsikayatsie kemira'imawa, hetsiena pirahiiyani.
Kepauka yamireyutimani hetsiena kename 'axatiuyuri, 'ana penuhana xeime tsipu 'ukitime 'aixia 'anekame mawari mayaniki.
'Ana mu'uyatsie 'utimeme Yawé hixie kaniwaxitemiki, hakewa memanutixitewa mawari taiyariyari mayaniki. Miki memi'itiyani mawariyari pi'ayumieme.
Hiki mawari wewiwame 'itiya mawariyari xuriyayatsie yu'itiwame heuketsati mawari taiyame 'awateyatsie panuwiriexiani, kwitita xuriya muyuhayewaxi mawari taiyame 'ikateya hetia naime pitiyeurieni.

Kwitita tsipu wiyayari naime mepayetuni, muxa wiyayari 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari memite'ayetu'iri hepai, mawari wewiwame mawari taiyametsie pitataiya 'imikieri mawari taipa warikarieti Yawé hetsiemieme miyetuiya heima.
Mipai mawari wewiwame miki tewi hetsiemieme 'itiya pitiwewieni, ke'axamitiuyuriekaiki pireuyehiwiyarieni.
>>Xika tewi muxa yetuani mi'itiyani mawariyari mayaniki, miki muxa 'uka 'aixia mi'ane pihikitini.
Muxa mu'uyatsie 'utimeti kaniwaxitemiki 'itiya mawariyari mayaniki, hakewa memanutixitewa mawari taiyariyari mayaniki.
Hiki mawari wewiwame 'itiyari mawariyari xuriyayatsie yu'itiwame heuketsati mawari taiyame 'awateyatsie panuwiriexiani, kwitita xuriya muyuhayewaxi mawari taiyame 'ikateya hetia naime pitiyeurieni.

Kwitita tsipu wiyayari naime mepayetuni, muxa wiyayari 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari memite'ayetu'iri hepai, mawari wewiwame mawari taiyametsie pitataiya 'imikieri mawari taipa warikarieti Yawé hetsiemieme miyetuiya heima.
Mipai mawari wewiwame miki tewi hetsiemieme 'itiya pitiwewieni, ke'axamitiuyuriekaiki pireuyehiwiyarieni.

Hiki Yawé Muitsexi meta 'Aruni mipai katiniwarutahiawe: <<Xeme kepauka xemeutahaxianitsie Kanani kwieyaritsie, nemixeyetuirie xehetsiemieme mayaniki, ne hipame xekitetsie mutuxariya mitiyuwiriwe nepawetsitiaxiani,
kii kutsiyari mawari wewiwame mipai pititahiawe: "Nekiita mutuxariya kanawetikani". Mipai tiyurieme mawari wewiwame peutahani mixeiyaki.

Mawari wewiwame kii mi'itieniki yuhutame wikixi kaniwaranutikimiki, kariuxa mexayari 'etsihawekame meta hitsupu xawariyari, yax- eikiata tuwaxa mixeta. Xewiti wiki piwaxiteni haxu xariyarita haa muyemata haixata mieme muwa xuriyaya kanitatuamiki, kariuxa kiyeyari panukweni, meta hitsupu xawariyari meta tuwaxa mixeta, xeimeta wiki mayeniere, 'iki naime mekatenitiwirikuni wiki muwaxitekie xuriyayaki meta haa haixata miemeki.

Hiki wiki pitatuani mayeniere yeuta paiti. Mipai kii mixinarieniki mawariyari pitiwewieni, 'anari 'itiyati puyuhayewa. 37 'Iki 'iniari niukiyari pihikitini mireuyehiwiyarieni, tsepa kemititita haiya xetati mukumarike waiyarieyatsie,

yatini mutuxariyaki, 'ixurikitetsie yatini kiita 'ixumeritsie heukuwetikani, 39 yatini xika 'utahani, yatini haiya, yatini tuxati heukunexiani, 40 miyiweniki miti'ikitaniki naitsarie kepauka tita miti'itiya yatini mikati'itiyaki. 'Iki 'iniari niukiyari kanihikitini kwiniya mitiyuwiriwe hetsiemieme».
>>Xika xewiti xeme 'anayexeiyarieni heitserie mititaxataki tita mitiuxei meta tita mutiu'eni hepaitsita, xika yuku'imawani katixatamiti pitika'eniexiani 'axamitiuyuriki.
>>Yaxeikia xewiti xika 'atsikatimaiti mitimiki tiumayiani, tewatsiekame yatini yeutanaka meta yutawima mukuyeika, miki ka'itiyati kanayuyeitiamiki hetsiena katinahiiyamiki tsepa 'atsimikaretima.
Xika xewiti 'atsikatimaiti tewi mika'itiya 'umayiani waiyarieyatsie, tsepatitaki miki mikati'itiya, mikita ka'itiyati payuyeitiani. Xika 'arike mipai retimani hetsiena pitiuhiiwani.

>>>Xika xewiti 'atsikatimaiti 'uyutakeni 'ipai tiyihiritiati, mexia niuki wewieti 'aixia mitiyurieniki, yatini 'axamitiyurieniki, matsi xikaratimaiya, hetsiena katinahiiyamiki kepauka miki meye'erienitsi

>>Kemi'ane hetsiena mirahiiwa 'iki naime hepaitsita, kaneuyeweka muyutahekiataki ke'axamitiuyuriki, meta peuyewetse Yawé mawari miwewirieniki hetsiena mitiuhiiwa mawari taiyariyari xeime muxa 'ukatime yatini kapira 'axakemitiuyuriki. Mipai mawari wewiwame 'itiya pitiwewieni 'axamitiuyuriki.
Tixaiti mikarexeiya hetsiemieme

Xika xewiti muxa minaneniki ka'i'axeni, Yawé pita panutikirieni yuhutame weuraixi yatini haimixi mirayukatuani mawariyari ke'axamitiuyuriki. Xewiti miki mi'itiyaniki mawariyari payani, xewitita mawari taiyariyari payani.
Mawari wewiwame hetsia piwa'atiani, miki waurai meri piyetuiyani mi'itiyaniki mawariyari mayaniki. Hiki kiipieya puwakuhirumina mu'uyatsie ka'anutiteketi.
Kwitiwata 'itiya mawariyari xuriyayaki 'etsiwa xeitapatsie mawari taiyame peuta'iya, meta xuriya muyuhayewa mawari taiyame hetia pita'ipakieni. Miki 'itiya mawariyari pihiki.
'Utimana miemeta mawari wewiwame kani- tataiyamiki 'aitsika kemaine. Mipai mawari wewi- wame 'itiya pitiwewieni, 'ana ke'axamitiuyuriki pireuyehiwiyarieni.

>>Yatini matsi yuhutame weuraixi meta haimixi pikatiwa'axe, huta kiruyari tiriku mitixiyari 'aixia mi'ane pita pi'atiani 'itiya mawariyari mayaniki. Huriwa hatseitiyari pika'iniituani meta 'ikwa witsimu'ia, miki 'itiya mawariyari kanihikitini.
Mawari wewiwame hetsia pi'atiani, mikita yumamaki yapaimeme 'anatitume ma'eriwaniki mawariyari, 'ana mawari taiyametsie naime yinikame pititaiya Yawé hixie.
Mipai mawari wewiwame 'itiya pitiwewieni, ke'axamitiuyuritsie pireuyehiwiyarieni. Mawari muyuhayewa hetsiemieme payani, yaxeikia tiriku hatsiyari mawariyari hepаі».

Merikitsi Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniu- tahiawe: 15 «Xika xewiti tewi 'atsikatimaiti 'axatiuyurieni Yawé tipiinieya mitipatsietika hepaitsita, kaneuyeweka muxa 'uki Yawé manuhanirieniki 'aixia 'aneme 'imikieri mirayukatuani mawariyari mayaniki. Pirata tukita keraye'akameki memiteyukutuaya hepai, 'iki mawari mirayukatuani mawariyari pihiki. 16 Miyatiyurieme, miki tewi pirayukatuani ke'axamitiuyuriki Kakaiyari tipiinieya mitipatsietikatsie timiemeki, 'auxiwimeyaritsie mieme xei'iniariyari mawari wewiwame kaniyetuiriemiki. Mipai mawari wewiwame 'itiya pitiwewieni tewi hetsiemieme muxa 'ukiki mirayukatuani mawariyari mayaniki, 'ana pireuyehiwiyarieni ke'axamitiuyuriki. 17 >>Xika xewiti 'atsikatimaiti 'axatiuyurieni Yawé 'aitsikaya kemikahainetsie, tsepa 'atsikatiuyurieme muyu'erie tiuka'eniwati payani 'axamitiuyuriki. 18 Miki muxa 'uki 'aixia mi'ane panuhana mawari wewiwame hetsia, miki mirayukatuani mawariyari kemitika'iniari kaniyetuamiki. Mipai mawari wewiwame 'itiya pitiwewieni hetsiena mieme miki 'axakemitiuyuriki 'atsikatimaiti, 'ana miki pireuyehiwiyarieni. 19 'Iki mirayukatuani mawariyari kanihikitini, mitiuhiiya kemi'ane yuriki hetsiena 'axamitiuyuriki Yawé hepaitsita».
Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniutahiawe:

«Xika xewiti hetsie rahiiyani 'axakatin iyurimiki Yawé hepaitsita, 'aixia katii'iwiyaka kepauka hepaina tewi tixaiti tihiritiaku, yatini tinawatsirieni, yatini wairiyarika tinawairieni tita miki mitipiinieya,
yatini xika tixaiti retaxeiyame reuyehiiyaku kename kaheixeiya 'utayini yaki'utaiti yihiritiani yamiti'iyamateki xeikia,

kemi'ane 'iki miyapaimeme hepaitsita yuhepai tewi mukwamanaxi miki hetsiena pirahiiyani. Miki tewi piiniteya mitinawatsiri tihiritiaku katiniyetuiriemiki. Meta tita wairiyarika mitinawairi, yatini tita reuyehiiyaku mitiutaxei mika'itaxa, yatini tixaiti tiutaxeiyaka kename kaheixeiya 'utaiti,

yanutsu tsepa titaki yuhiritiati tiu'itani. 'Ayumieme pitiyetuani heitseriemeki meta 'auxiwimeyaritsie mieme xei'iniariyari kaniyetuamiki tita mirexeiyani. Naime 'iki kutsiyarieya katiniyetuiriemiki kepauka mirayukatuani mawariyari muwewienitsie.
Yawé panuhanirieni muxa 'uki 'aixia mi'ane, mirayukatuani mawariyari kemitika'iniari kaniyetuamiki. 'Ana mawari wewiwame piyetuirieni,
miki 'itiya miwewieniki Yawé hixie tewi hetsiemieme, tsepa titaki hetsiena mirahiiwa pireuyehiwiyarieni».
Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniutahiawe
'Aruni meta niwemama mipai mitiwatahiaweki: <<'Iki 'iniari niukiyari kanihikitini mawari taiyariyaritsie mieme: Mawari taiyariyari pitaka mawari taiyametsie tikariki kepaukake mikataretsie.
Mawari wewiwame rinu kamixayari panakatini meta weruxiyari yukamixa hetia, hiki mawari taiyariyari naxiyari kanikuxeirimiki, mawari taiyame 'aurie pitiyeni.
Hiki kamixate mawari hetsiemieme miranakatikikai kananutihinaxiamiki, hipameta kamixate ranakatime mematiteitsie naxi panuyetuni, hakewa maku'itiyarietsie penutuni.

Mawari taiyametsie tai yapititaka mepika'ikutitsani. Mawari wewiwame matsi kiyexi panutixiriwani ximeri meta mawari taiyame heima mawari taiyariyari 'aixia pititeni heimana 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari wiyayari mitataiyaki.
Tai mawari taiyametsie mieme hatsuaku tima pikahanukatititseni, yuheyemeki yapititaka. Tiriku mawariyari
>>'Iki 'iniari niukiyari kanihikitini tiriku mawariyaritsie mieme: 'Aruni niwemama Yawé hixie, mawari taiyametsie mekaniyetuiriekuni.

Mawari wewiwame xeimamayari 'imikieri mawariyari panatituni tiriku mitixiyari 'aixia mi'ane hatseiti nikame, meta 'ikwa witsimu'ia hatsi mawariyari heima maka. Naime 'iki mawari taiyametsie xekanititaiyakuni, mawari ma'eriwa 'imikieri witsimu'ia Yawé minake mayaniki.
'Aruni meta niwemama 'imikieri mawari- yari manayuhayewa mekanitikwaikuni, hakewa mekupatsietsie tikuxanariyame kanikame, 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwe takwayaritsie piyiweni memitikwaniki.

Tikuxanariyame kaniti puka'etsariwani, miki kanihikitini mawari wewiwamete nemixeyetuirie nemawari xeminetsiwewirie taipa. 'Iki pihiki waikawa mipatsie kepapaimeti wahetsia mumieme, miki mi'itiyani meta mirayukatuani mawariyari pihiki.
Yunaiti 'Aruni niwemamata 'ukitsi mepiyiwaweni memitikwaniki. Miki 'aitsika kanihikitini yuheyemeki xetiriyama wahetsiemieme, mawari taipa kemiti'atiariwa Yawé hetsiemieme.
Tsepa ketita piinitetsie mawari mireutawerixi miki patsieti payani». 'Imikieri mawariyariyariki kememite'anayexexeiyariwa

Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniutahiawe: 21 'Aruni meta niwemama mipai mitiwatahiaweki: <<'Iki 'iniari niukiyari kanihikitini kemitiu'itiyani mawariyari hepaitsita: Tita mitimawarie Yawé hixie kaniwaxitekiemiki. Hakewa memewaxitewa mawari taiyariyari mayaniki.
Mawari wewiwame kemi'ane 'itiya mawariyari miwewieni miki kanitikwaimiki. Hakewa makupatsietsie, piyiweni 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwe takwayaritsie mitikwaniki.
Tsepa kemititita xika wai mawaritsiemieme heutawere patsieti payani. Xika xuriya 'ixuriki tukiyatsie hawere kaneuyeweka makupatsietsie mita'ekwaki.
Yaxeikiata, peuyewetse haxu xariyari mitatararieniki mikita mawari muka'etsarieki, mawari xika wurunitse xariyarita 'uka'etsarieni tepiaki naime piwakukarauxieni meta haki piwakuhauxini.
Yunaiti 'ukitsi mawari wewiwamete wahamatia mekaniyiwaweni mawari memitikwaniki. 'Iki kanihikitini mawari yemeki waikawa mipatsie.
Matsi 'itiya mawariyari mitikwayaniki pikayiweni miki xuriyaya tuki muyepatsieta me'iiwaki mixinarieni mawariyari muwewiyaniki, 'ayumieme miki mawari taiki kanitixitsitiariemiki.
>>>'Iki 'iniari niukiyari kanihikitini mirayukatuani mawariyari hepaitsita, miki waikawa mipatsie kanihikitini:
'Iki mawari Yawé hixie kaniwaxitekiemiki, hakewa memetikwikwiwatsie mawari taiyariyari mayaniki, meta xuriyaya mawari taiyame 'aurie pitiyeuriyani.
Hiki naiti wiyayari pixatiarieni: kwaxieya, wiyaya kwinurieya mi'eimatika,
mumé muhuta meta wiyayari mi'eimatika, meta wiya katutsitiana mieme, meta wiya nemaya heimana mikawere, miki pirayehapanieni mumé muhuta yinikame.
Mawari wewiwame naime miki mawari taiyametsie pitititaiya, mawari taipa warikarieti Yawé hetsia miyetuiwa kanihikitini.
Yunaiti 'ukitsi mawari wewiwamete wahamatia mekaniyiwaweni mawari memitikwaniki. Piyiweni makupatsietsie memitikwaniki. 'Iki kanihikitini mawari yemeki waikawa mipatsie.
>>'Iki 'iniari niukiyari yaxeikia paine, mi'itiyani mawariyari hepaitsita meta mirayukatuani mawariyari hepaitsita: Muxa mawari wewiwame hetsie pimiemetini mixinarieni mawariyari muwewiki.
Yaxeikiata nawiyarieya, mawari wewiwame hetsiemieme pihikitini mawari taiyariyari muwewiki.
Yaxeikia naiti hatsite mawariyari huxunuta xarikietikaiti yatini xarita, meta katsuweratsie, miki mawari wewiwame kemi'ane miyetuani hetsiemieme pitihikitini.
Naiti tiriku mawariyari, xarikiyari yatini hatseitiki mihawiyarie, 'Aruni niwemama wahetsiemieme payani, mepitikwani yunaiti yaxeikia papaimeme.
>>>'Iki 'iniari niukiyari kanihikitini 'aixia mawariyari Yawé memiteyuxeiya miyetuiriyariwa:

Xika pamipariyutsi xemipitianiki hikitini, piyiwenita paa tikuxanariyame kaniti hatseitiki xeikia hawiyariekame, yatini paa kixauyari tikuxanariyame kaniti hatseiti nikame xeikia, yatini paa tiriku mitixiyari 'aixia mi'ane hatseitiki xeikia hawiyariekame.
'Aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari meta pamipariyutsi xemipitiaki, piyiweni meta paa tikuxanariyame nikame xemiyetuirieniki.

Xexuiti mawaritetsie mieme yapapaimeti Yawé 'imikierieya 'aixia mi'ane pirayani miki mawari teiki petserarieni 'uyuitiariwati. Miki mawari wewiwame hetsiemieme pirayani kemi'ane xuriya mitayeurieni 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari hetsiemieme.
'Iki wai mawariyari piyiweni mitikwaiyaniki xeikia kepauka miyetuiyani tukariyaritsie, xepika'ikuhayeikawani 'uxa'arieka mieme mayaniki.
>>Xika mawari kepemutayi mawariyari hikitini, yatini kepemiti'awairiya mawariyariyatini, miki wai mawariyari pitikwaiyani miki tukaritsie, mexika yuhayewa piyiweni 'uxa'arieka mitikwaniki.
Peru naiti wai muyuhayewa hairieka tukaritsie mieme taipa kanititaiyariemiki.
>>>Xika xewiti wai 'utikwani 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari waiyarieya 'utikwani Yawé hetsiemieme miyetuiya, miki yuteiterima watsata payeweiyarieni.
>>Xika wai mawariyari tixaiti mikati'itiyatsie rautawere pikatikwaiyani, matsi pita taipa kanitataiyariemiki. Matsita xewiti wai mi'itiya, yunaiti teiteri memi'itiyatika mepiyiwaweni memitikwani.
>>>Xika xewiti tewi ka'itiyati 'aixia memiteyuxeiya mawariyari waiyarieya 'utikwani Yawé hetsiemieme miyetuiya, miki yuteiterima watsata payeweiyarieni.

Xika xewiti tewi ka'itiyakame 'umayiani yatini yeuta mitiuyeika yatini tixaiti timikime yatini tixiati mitixani'eriwa, 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari Yawé muxatiarie 'utikuani, miki yuteiterima watsata payeweiyarieni».

Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniuta'aitiani 23 'ixaheritsixi mipai mitiwatahiaweki: «Xeme tuuru, muxa meta tsipu wawiyayari xepikakwa'ani. 24 Yeuta memite'u'uwa wawiyayari mikime yatini 'irawe 'itexierieya, tixaititsie timiemeki mirayani piyiweni, peru xemitikwaniki pikayiweni. 25 Kemi'ane tewaxi Yawé hetsia memiyetuiya mawari taipa warikariekame wawiyayari mitikwani, miki payeweiyarieni yuteiterima watsata. 26 Tsepa xeme hakewa xemetiteni, tsepa wikixi meta tewaxi wawiyayari meta waxuriya xepikahekwa'ani. 27 Kemi'ane tsepa tita xuriyaya mititikwani, miki payeweiyarieni yuteiterima watsata».

Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniuta'aitiani 29 'ixaheritsixi mipai mitiwatahiaweki: «Kemi'ane Yawé 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari miwewirieni, miki yapaimeme kaniyetuamiki Yawé hixie mawari hetsiena mieme mayaniki, 30 meta mawari taipa warikariekame xepiyetuani. Taimixieya meta wiyayari yikimana piyetuirieni mawari 'imikieri taipa wairikariyari teiki kanetseramiki 'iyuitiwati Yawé hetsiemieme mayaniki. 31 Mawari wewiwame mawari taiyametsie wiya pitataiya, peru taimixieya 'Aruni meta niwemama wahetsiemieme payani. 32 Kepauka 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari xemiwewieka, teuri tserietana mieme mawari wewiwame xepiyetuirieni, miki mawari 'imikieri teiki metserariwa kanihikitini. 33 Miki teuri tserietana mieme mawari wewiwame hetsia pimieme kemi'ane xuriya meta wiya mawariyari muwewieni. 34 Miki 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari 'ixaheritsixi meminetsixatia, ne taimixi meta teuri neputanaki'eri nemuxatiarie, 'Aruni meta niwemama nemiwayetuirieniki, mawari wewiwamete ne'imikieri 'aixia mi'ane mayaniki. 'Iki kanihikitini 'aitsika yuheyemeki 'aixia mi'ane, 'Ixaheritsixi wahetsiemieme». 35 Yawé muxatiarie 'imikieri taipa warikarieti miyetuiwa, miki 'imikieriyari mipatsie 'Aruni meta niwemama wahetsiemieme pihiki, kepauka memitsutia Muitsexi miwayetua Yawé hetsia, mawari wewiwamete memakineki. 36 Kepauka memanayexeiyarie, Yawé 'ixaheritsixi mipai pitiwarihiritia memiwayetuiriwaniki yuheyemeki tita wahetsie mitinakenikekai. 'Iki kanihikitini 'aitsika 'aixia mi'ane yuheyemeki xenuiwari wahetsiemieme. 37 'Iki naiti 'aitsikate kanihikitini mawari taiyariyari hetsiemieme, tiriku mawariyari, mi'itiyani mawariyari, meta mirayukatuani mawariyari, meta kememite'anayexeiyarie mawariyari, meta 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari. 38 Yawé Muitsexi Tsinahi yemuriyaritsie katiniyetuirieni, kepauka 'ixaheritsixi mawari memixatianiki mitiwaruta'aitia makumawetsie.

Hiki Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniutahiawe: 2 <<'Aruni meta niwemama keniwaranuwitiki, meta wakemarite meta hatseiti mitiyupata memikawiriyarieni, meta tsikeru 'itiya mawariyari mayaniki, yuhutame muxatsi 'ukitsi meta tsikiiwiti paa mikakuxanariyarietika mayemane, 3 yunaime keniwarukuxeiri kiekatari 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwe hixie». 4 Muitsexi yakatinikayani Yawé kemitita'aitia, kaniwarukuxeirieni yunaime kiekatari 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwe kitenieyaritsie. 5 Muitsexi mana 'ipai katiniwarutahiawe: <<'Iki kanihikitini Yawé kemitati'aitia yatemiteyurieniki».
Hiki Muitsexi 'Aruni meta niwemama warutakwewieka 'ahurawa haki puwarukahauxi.
'Ana 'Aruni kamixa tixukame panakatitia, hiiyameki kanenakihiani meta kanenaku'eima herie kamixa 'amitewiki, yaxeikia kamixa 'etsiminena wiwieriyariteki 'axia katinihiaxiani.
Kwitita kuka tawitsie mieme kanekatitiani, taitana tetexi 'urimi meta tumimi kaneukayatsa.
'Imatirieka 'ixuriki xupureruyari mu'uyatsie kanenutiketsirieni, hixiena huru tepiayari kanenuyeketsirieni 'iniari mihikitiniki kename patsie Yawé hetsiemieme, Yawé Muitsexi kemitiuta'aitia.
Hiki Muitsexi hatseiti mitiyupata watihanaka, tuki kaniutawirieni meta tinaime muwa mirayepikai tipatsieti mirayaniki kakaiyaritsie mieme.
Mawari taiyametsie 'atahutamexia hatseitiki kaninii'iyaxiani mitipatsiekaki, miki haa mayema mawari taiyametsie meta kimana miwetika meta naime wapaiti miratipine.
Hiki Muitsexi 'Aruni mu'uyatsie kaniukawirieni hatseiti mitiyupata manayex- eiyarietsie mieme, kimana mipatsiekaki.

Kuitiwata Muitsexi 'Aruni niwemama 'ahurawa 'amititiki, kaniwarutakwewieni, kamixa kaniwarutikemaritiani kaniwaranahiaxiani, meta mukuretsi kaniwarana'uitiirieni mawari wewiwamete memihiritiarie memakineki. Yaxeikia Yawé kemitita'aitiakai.
Hiki Muitsexi katiniuta'aita tsikeru mi'atiarieniki 'itiya mawariyari mayaniki, 'Aruni meta niwemama muxa 'uki mu'uyatsie mekaniutimeni.

Hiki Muitsexi tsikeru kanewaxiteni, 'etsiwa xuriyatsie yu'itiwame kakeka, mawari taiyame 'awateyatsie naitsata kanawiriexiani mi'itiyaniki Kakaiyaritsie mieme. Xuriya muyuhayewaxita mawari taiyame hetia putiyeuri, mipai patsiekame pirayeitia hetsiena mieme meta memixinarieniki mawariyari.
Hiki Muitsexi naime wiya kwinuri mi'eimatika kaneukuxiteni, wiya nemaya heimana mikawere meta mumé muhuta mi'eima miki naime 'ukuxeirieka mawari taiyametsie kanititaiya.
Miki naiti tsikerutsie mitiuyuhayewaxi nawiyari, waiyari meta kwitaya, Muitsexi taipa kanititaiya yateewa memakuteitsie, Yawé kemitita'aitiakai.
Muitsexi pitiuta'ai muxa 'uki mi'atiarieniki mawari taiyariyari mayaniki, hiki 'Aruni meta niwemama muxa 'uki mu'uyatsie mekaniutimeni.
'Ana Muitsexi kanewaxiteni, xuriya mawari taiyame 'aurie kaniutayeurieni.
Hiki muxa 'uki kaniwayexitexiani, yaxeikiata mu'uya meta wiyayari meta 'etsipepeme mitiutixitekai naime katiniutitaiya.

Kwinurieyata haki kaniutihauxini meta 'ikateya, hikita mawari taiyametsie muxa 'uki naime kaniutataiya mawari taiyariyari mayaniki Yawé minake witsimu'ia, mawari taipa warikariekame Yawé hetsia miyetuiwa kanihikitini. 'Iki 'imikieri taiyariyari, Yawé Muitsexi kemitiuta'aitiakai.
'Ariketa Muitsexi tawari xeime muxa 'uki memi'atianiki katiniuta'aita, 'iki kememite'anayexeiyarie mawariyari mayaniki, hiki 'Aruni meta niwemama muxa 'uki mu'uyatsie mekaniutimeni.

Hiki Muitsexi kaniwaxiteni 'etsiwa xuriya 'anati'ika 'Aruni nakaya heima tserietana mieme 'etsiwa kaniuwirieni meta 'itiwameya 'amipayaritsie tserietana mieme meta 'ikayatsie mieme 'amipayari tserietana mieme.

Yaxeikiata 'Aruni meta niwemama 'ahurawa memakineki kaniwaruta'inieni. 'Anari wanaka heima kaniwarutixurimani watserieta meta wa'itiwame 'amipayaritsie watserieta mieme meta wa'ikatetsie 'amupapayari watserieta miemeyaritsie, hiki xuriya muyuhayewaxi mawari taiyame 'aurie kaniutayeurieni naitsata.
Wiya meta kwaxieya naiti mana mirayepikai kwinurite miti'eimatika, meta wiya nemaya heimana mikawere, meta mumé muhuta wiyayari yuniti meta teuri tserietana mieme.

Tsikiiwiti Yawé hixie mamakaitsie paa tikuxanariyame mikanitika mayemane xeime mikakuxanariyarie hanati'ika, meta mikixauni meta xeime paa tsuirayari hatseitiki xeikia mihawiyarie, miki naime wiya heima katinapini meta teuri tserietana mieme.
'Iki tinaime Muitsexi 'Aruni meta niwemama katiniwayetuirieni, hiki 'Aruni mawari Yawé kaniuxatiani hixiena teiki heititserieti 'iyuitiwati 'imikieri mawariyari minake.

'Ariketa Muitsexi kaniyetuiriyarieni, miki mawari taiyametsie kanititaiya, mawari taiyariyari yinikame, kememite'anayexeiyarie mawariyari witsimu'ia mayaniki, meta 'imikieri taipa warikariekame Yawé miyetuiriyarie.
Hiki miki mawari yapaimeme wahetsie mumieme, taimixieya 'anukutuka Muitsexi Yawé hixie kaneititsera 'iyuitiwati, Yawé Muitsexi kemitita'aitiakai.
Hiki Muitsexi hatseiti mitiyupata memiwakawiriwa 'etsiwa 'anahanika meta xuriya mawari taiyametsie mieme, 'Aruni meta niwemama kaniwaru'iyaxiani meta wakemarite.

Hiki 'Aruni meta niwemama Muitsexi mipai katiniwarutahiawe: <<Xemayutixexeiriwa Kakaiyari hamatia 'ixuriki kiyari manuwe xemeutahaketsie, mana wai xekeneuka'etsa meta xekeneukwa'i paa kememite'anayexeiyarie mawariyari nikame, mipai kenemitixe'utahiawe kepauka 'ipai nemutayitsie: "'Aruni meta niwemama mepitikwani".
Naiti wai meta paa mitiuyuhayewaxi xepititaiya.
'Ixuriki tukiyari kitenie xemayutixexeiriwa miranutahakitiretsie, mana 'atahuta tukari xekenekuteni, kepaukake xemanayexeiyarie maye'ani, 'atahuta tukari katineuterimiki.
Yawé katiniuta'aita mixinarieni mawariyari muwewiyaniki xehetsiemieme, yaxeikia hiki hepai.
Merikite miranutahakitiretsie 'ixuriki tukiyari mana xekanikutekuni Yawé 'atahuta tukari meta tikariki, kemixetiuta'aitia xemeye'atiakaki, xemikakukukuweniki. Yawé mipai kanetiniuta'aitiani».
Hiki Yawé Muitsexi kemitiuta'aitia, 'Aruni meta niwemama yamekatenikakine naimetsie.
Merikite 'atahairieka tukaritsie, Muitsexi 'Aruni kaniutahiawe meta niwemama, metatsiere 'ukirawetsixi 'ixaheritsixi wa'ukiyarima.
Hiki 'Aruni mipai katiniutahiawe: «Tsikeru xeime kene'atia mi'itiyani mawariyari mayaniki, meta xeime muxa 'uki mawari taiyariyari mayaniki, miki 'aixia mepi'aneneni Yawé pekanixatiamiki.

Kwitiwata 'ixaheritsixi mipai ketiniwaru- tahiawi: "Xekene'atia xeime tsipu 'ukitime 'itiya mawariyari mayaniki, xeimeta tsikeru meta muxa mawari taiyariyari mayaniki, 'aixia me'anenekame xeiwiyari mehitikaime.

Yaxeikiatatsiere tuuru xeime xekene'atia xeimeta muxa 'uki Yawé temitimawirieniki 'aixia memiteyuxeiyani mawariyari mayaniki, meta tiriku mawariyari hatseitiki hawiyariekame. Yawé hiki kaniyuhekiatamiki xehixie"».
Hiki 'ixaheritsixi mekatenetini 'ixuriki tukiyari manuwetsie paiti Muitsexi kemitiwaruta'aitiakai, yunaiti mana kiekatari mekaniu'axiani Yawé hixie mekaniti'uni.
Muitsexi mipai katiniwarutahiawe: <<'Iki kanihikitini ti'aitame mitixe'aitia yaxemiteyuriekaki, Yawé witsi'aneti kemitimatsiikini xehixie».

Hikita Muitsexi 'Aruni mipai katiniutahiawe: <<Mawari taiyametsie 'ahurawa keneuye'a, 'itiya mawariyari meta mawari taiyariyari keneuwewi 'ahetsiemieme. Meta mixinarieni mawariyarita keneuwewi 'ahetsiemieme meta teiteri wahet- siemieme. Mawari keneuxatia teiteri wahet- siemieme meta mixinarieni keneuwewi wahet- siemieme, Yawé kemitiuta'aitaxi».
Hiki 'Aruni mawari taiyametsie 'ahurawa 'uyaka, tsikeru kaniwaxiteni 'itiya mawariyari hetsiena mieme mayaniki.
'Aruni niwemamata xuriya mekanei'iirieni, miki yu'itiwame xuriya 'utawirieka mawari taiyame 'awateyatsie kaniuwiriexiani, meta xuriya kaniutiyeurieni mawari taiyame hetia.
Hiki wiyayari mawari taiyametsie kaniuti- taiya, muhuta mumé meta wiya nemaya heimana mikawere mitimawarietsie mieme, mipai Yawé Muitsexi mitiu'aitiakaiki.
Nawiyari meta waiyarieya memakuteitsie ya- teewa paiti kaniutitaiya.
'Ariketa 'Aruni mawari taiyariyari mayani kaniwaxiteni. Niwemama xuriya makanei'iirieni, miki kanitayeurieni mawari taiyame waritana naitsarie.
Yaxeikiata tuurutsie mitiwayexitekiexia meta mu'uya yunikame mekateneitituirieni, 'ana miki mawari taiyametsie katiniutitaiya.
Kwinurite meta 'ikate kaniutihauxini, hiki naime mawari taiyametsie katiniutitaiya mawari taiyariyari yinikame.
Hiki 'Aruni teiteri wahetsiemieme mawari kaniyetuani, tatsiari tsipu 'ukitime 'itiya mawariyari mayaniki.
Hiki miki tita mawari taiyariyari mirayanikekai kanixatiani, kememite'u'aitiariekai mipai pitiuyuri.
Yaxeikiata tiriku mawariyari kanixatiani, meta xeimamayari 'anatituka mawari taiyamet- sie kanititaiya, yaxeikiata mawari taiyariyari ximeri mieme yinikame.

'Ariketa tuuru kaniwaxiteni meta muxa 'uki 'aixia memiteyuxeiyani mawariyari teiteri yu- naime wahetsiemieme mayaniki. 'Aruni niwemama xuriya mepei'iiri, miki mawari taiyame 'aurie pitayeuri naitsarie.
Hiki tuuru wiyayari 'utituka meta muxa 'uki, tatsiari, kwaxieya meta wiyayari kwinuriteya mi'eimatika, meta mumé muhuta yaxeikia wiya nemaya heimana mikawere,
miki tinaime watawitsie katinapixiamiki, mawari taiyametsieketa mitititaiyaki.

'Aruni Yawé tawi meta teuri tserietana miemete tita memitemawarietsie timieme kanixatiani hixiena kaneititsera 'iyuitiwati. Mawari teiki hetserarieti 'uyuitiariwati patia, Muitsexi kehepai mitiuta'aitakai.

Hiki 'Aruni teiteri wahepa yumamate kanetseraxiani, 'ana teiteri 'aixia kaniwaruyurieni. Hiki kepauka mitiutahayewaxi 'itiya mawariyari wewieti, meta mawari taiyariyari, meta 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari 'uwewieka, mawari taiyametsie kanewakayani.
Muitsexi meta 'Aruni 'ixuriki tukiyarita mekaneutahaxiani. Kepauka memuwayekitsie teiteri 'aixia mekaniwaruyurieni, 'ana Yawé witsikemi'ane matsiikiti kanayuyeitiani yunaime teiteri wahixie.

Hiki Yawé hetsia tai kanakaneni, 'ana miki naime mawari taiyariyari meta wiyayari mawari taiyame heima mirapikai kaniutixitsitiani. Mipai mete'uneniereka, yunaiti teiteri mekaniutihiwa meyutemamawieti, meta kwiepa mekaniukahixima'uni.

Hiki Narawi meta 'Awihu 'Aruni niwemama, yuxexuiti yupitsiwiwame me'utihapaxiaka, me'akanaixiaka 'ikwa witsimu'ia me'akawiwiexiaka, Yawé mekaniuxatiani, matsi miki tai kaheuyewekakaku mepixatia, miki mikawaruta'aitiakaiki.
Hiki Yawé hetsia tai kanayeneni kaniwarutixitsitiani, hixiena mekaniukwini.

Muitsexi 'Aruni mipai katiniutahiawe: «'Iki hepaitsita painekai Yawé kepauka mipai mutayi: >>"Kemi'ane nehetsia 'ahurawa memakika wahetsia, kenemitipatsieki nepaneyeitiaka, Meta yunaime teiterima wahixie nematsiikime witsikenemi'aneki nepinehekiata"». 'Ana 'Aruni kayuwati pitiuke.

Muitsexi Mitsaheri meta 'Eritsapani katiniwarutani'airieni 'Utsiheri niwemama 'Aruni tatatsieya, mipai katiniwarutahiawe: «Xekenakini 'ena 'ahurawa meta yu'iwama tukita xekeniwaranuye'ii. Tematiteitsie 'ateewa paiti xekeniwatuayu».
Miki 'ahurawa me'ikineka, wakamixatetsie metiwitikaiti memakutekaitsie 'ateewa mekaniwar anuye'ini, Muitsexi kemitiwaruta'aitiakai.

Hiki Muitsexi 'Aruni meta niwemama 'Eriyatsaxi meta 'Itamaxi miki niwemama memuyuhayewatiwekai: <<Tiriku mawariyari muyuhayewaxi Yawé 'imikierieya xekeneukutikika xekeneutikwa'i tikuxanariyame kaniitiariekame, mawari taiyame 'aurie, miki yemeki kanipatsieka Yawé hetsiemieme.

Xemeri 'ixuriki tukiyarita xepikawayekikani kapa xe'ukwiniki, xemanayexeiyarie Yawé hatseiti mitiyupata mixe'ukawiri xehetsie mitiunakixiki peuyewetse xemeye'atianiki kexemite'u'aitiarie». Muitsexi kemitiwarutahiawixi mipai mekateniuyurieni.
Yawé 'Aruni mipai katiniutahiawe:
<<'Eki meta 'aniwema kaxie winuyari xepika'ieka 'ixuriki tukiyarita kepauka xemautahaxiani kapa xe'ukwiniki. 'Iki 'aitsika yuheyemeki kanihikitikamiki xexiiyarima wahetsie mieme yamemitekahuniki.
Memiyiwawenikita yamemitemaikaki ketita mitipatsie meta mikatipatsie, yaxeikia ketita miti'itiya meta mikati'itiya.
Xepiyiwawenita 'ixaheritsixi xemitewata'ikitianiki naime 'aitsika Yawé mixeyetuiriki ya'utainekaku».

Muitsexi 'Aruni mipai katiniutahiawe meta niwemama 'Eriyatsaxi meta 'Itamaxi miki niwemama memuyuhayewatiwekai: <<Tiriku mawariyari muyuhayewaxi Yawé 'imikierieya xekeneukutikika xekeneutikwa'i tikuxanariyame kaniitiariekame, mawari taiyame 'aurie, miki yemeki kanipatsieka Yawé hetsiemieme.
Xekeneutikwa'i hakewa makupatsietsie, mipai nemiti'aitiarieki. Miki 'aitsika kanihikitini 'ahetsiemieme meta 'aniwema, miki mawari taipa warikarieti yapaimeme Yawé muxatiarie mihikiki.

>>'Eki meta 'aniwema 'ukitsi meta 'ukari xepiyiwaweta xemitikwaniki hakewa maku'itiyarietsie, taimixi tatsiari mawari teiki hetserarieti 'uyuitiariwati miyetuiya meta teuri miki mawari pihiki 'ahetsiemieme 'imikieri 'aixia mi'ane mayaniki, miki tihutati 'aixia memiteyuxeiyaniki mawariyari kanihikitini 'ixaheritsixi wahetsiemieme, 'eki meta 'aniwema xekaniyetuiriyarieni 'aitsika mihikitiniki.

Miki teuri meta taimixi pixatiarieni wiya yunikame, Yawé memiyetuirieni teiki hetserarieti 'uyuitiariwati mawariyari mihikiki. 'Iki 'aitsika pihikitini yuheyemeki 'ahetsiemieme meta 'aniwema, Yawé kemitiu'aitakai hepai».

Hiki Muitsexi tsipu kaniuta'iwauni 'itiya mawariyari hepaitsita mutimawarie, matsi mikiri taipa putataiyariekai. Kepauka yamiretima kename mawari taiyametsie 'utataiyariekai, miki 'Eriyatsaxi meta 'Itamaxi wahepaitsita kaniuyeha'ani, 'Aruni niwemama memiyuhayewatiwekai, 'ipai katiniwaruta'iwawiya:

-¿Ketitayari tuki muyepatsieta xekate'itikwai 'itiya mawariyari? Miki waikawa mipatsie kanihikitini, miki mawari Yawé hixie xekaniyetuiriyarieni xemixinarieni mawariyari mayaniki yunaiti xehetsie mirahiiwaki.
Peru xuriyaya xika xekahei'ini hakewa makupatsietsie, 'ayumieme peuyewekai xeme muxa waiyarieya xemitakwaniki tuki muyepatsieta ne kenemitixe'utahiawekaiki.

Hiki 'Aruni Muitsexi mipai katiniuta'eiya: -Neniwema hiki mepixatia 'itiya mawariyari meta yumawari taiyariyari Yawé hixie. Tsepa yumawari memiyetua, matsi 'iki miyamitiuyiki pinetiuka'enitsitia. Xiari 'aixia pika'anenikeyu Yawé hetsiemieme xika ne miki 'itiyari mawarit- sie timieme netiutikwanike.
Hiki Muitsexi 'u'enaka 'Aruni kemutayi 'iyarieya 'aixia kaniuyini.

Yawé Muitsexi meta 'Aruni mipai katini- waruta'aitiani 2 'ixaheritsixi mipai mitiwataxatianiki: «Yunaime yeutari kwiepa memitexiawe, 'iki mekanihikitini xepiyiwaweni xemiwakwa'aniki: 3 Wakarutsa manutahuhuta meta hutarieka memite'iyawa. 4 Matsita mekanixiaweni hipati mete'iyawati wakarutsa ka'anutahuhuta, miki pika'itiya xehetsiemieme. >>Kameyu piti'iyawa matsi karutsaya pika'anutahuhuta, miki pika'itiya xehetsiemieme. 5 >>Tatsiu piti'iyawa matsi karutsaya pika'anutahuta, mikita pika'itiya xehetsiemieme. 6 >>Yaxeikiata tatsiu hepai mi'ane mikita piti'iyawa matsi karutsaya pikahanutahuhuta, miki xepikakwa'ani mika'itiyaki xehetsiemieme. 7 Tuixu meta karutsaya panutahuhuta matsi pikati'iyawa, miki pika'itiya xehetsiemieme. 8 >>>Waiyarieya xepikakwa'ani meta mekwikwi'ime xepikawakumaiwani. Miki xehetsiemieme mepika'itiya. 9 >>Hapa memiteye'uwa, haramaratetsie meta muyehapanetsie 'iki mekanihikitini xeikia xeme xemiwakwa'ani: Memeukakararayatika yuhauweme memexeiya naitsata. 10 Yuhauweme meta yukararayari memikahexeiya, tsepa haramaratsie meta hatuxametsie memiye'uwa, xepiwaxani'erieka. miki xeme memikime mepika'itiyatika xehetsiemieme. 11 Waiyarieya xepikakwa'ani xepixani'erieka, miki pika'itiya xehetsiemieme. 12 Yunaiti hapa memiteye'uwa yuhauweme memikahexeiya meta memikaheukararayatika miki xepiwaxani'erieka mepika'itiya xehetsiemieme. 13 >>'Iki mekanihikitini memite'awiwawe xeme xemiwaxani'erieka meta xemikawakwa'ani: Werika, 'umete mumura, kwixi meta maraika, 14 yunaiti hukurixi meta wahepai memi'anene hipati, 15 meta yunaime kwatsari xepikawakwa'ani, 16 meta 'aru 'aminena, nipe, meta yunaiti yiki memi'anene paturi wahepai memi'anene, 17 mikiri, kwaxu meutsinaiye, patu, 18 tikaipu, patu hepai mi'ane 'amanuyepa, wiriki. 19 Kwaxu 'aminena, meta yunaiti yiki memi'anene kwaxuri, tsurakai meta 'atsixi. 20 >>Yunaiti memite'awiwawe menauka 'ikatikaiti miki xepiwamaika memika'itiyaki, mikita 21 Hipatita memuxiawe naukameki meheu'uwati memeu'uwa, miki xemiwatikwani xepiyiwawe, wakarutsa peukakukuni meta mepiyiwawe memititsunaxiani, 22 meta yunaiti 'utsikari wahepai memite'anene 'itsita memeutsunatika meta xuxuitsi. 23 Peru hipati naukameki memu'uwe meta xeme xepikawakwa'ani miki mema'anatika, mepika'itiyatika. 24 >>>Yunaiti memitexiawe kwiepa yutawima memiteku'uwa, miki memikame muyiwaweni miki memikame miwamayiani miki memikame mikiyiretsie. 25 >>Kemi'ane mikime manukukweni, miki kaneuyeweka yu'ixurikite miti'ekwa, miki ka'itiyati puyuhayewa kepaukake mikiyiretsie. 26 >>>Xemeri xepiwaxeiyani yeutari memika'itiyatika wakarutsate mikatuahuhuta meta yunaime wakarutsate kemi'ane mikareka'iyawame. Tsepa kemi'ane mimayiani ka'itiyati kanayeimiki. 27 >>Meta memitexiawe naukameki me'u'uweti memeu'uwa, mikita memika'itiya xepitewamaika yukitsimeki me'u'uweti memiteku'uwa, kemi'ane mikime mimayiani ka'itiyati kanayeimiki kepauka mikiyiretsieke, 28 yunaiti kemi'ane menukuhana kaneuyeweka yu'ixurikite memiti'ekwa, meta meka'itiyati mepakine kepauka mikiyuretsieke. Miki yeutari xeme memika'itiya xepitewamaika. 29 >>>Yunaiti memitexiawe yutawima memiteku'uwa, miki memika'itiyatika mepihikitini: kirupuxi, naikatsi meta katsaxi hipati yukimemi'anene, 30 mataika, ketse, tekaxi, kuu 'iwipame, 31 'iki mekanihikitini yeutari xeme meka'itiyakame xemiwarayeitiaka yutawima memiteku'uwa watsata. Kemi'ane mikime mimayiani miki ka'itiyati kaniyuhayewamiki kepauka mikiyiretsieke. 32 Hipati tawari 'iniari niukiyarite kwiepa memitexuawe memika'itiyatika xika wakumaiwani 33 >>Kepauka yeutanaka waiyarieya mikiti ka'itiyati tixaiti kiyetsie mitikaweni, yatini 'ixurikitsie, yatini nawitsie, yatini kamixa 'amayetsuye yamiranakatikietsie, miki ka'itiyati kanayeimiki. Kaneuyeweka haki mitahauxinireki, ka'itiyati kaniyuhayewamiki kepaukake mukiyiretsie. Hiki 'ana 'itiyati kanayeimiki. 34 Matsi xika kaxari yapaimeti tixaititsie tiukaweni miki ka'itiyati payani, kaneuyeweka mita'unaki huxunu meta huxiniyu hetsiena mukaweki. Miki kaxari pika'itiya mipai xepute'ixeiyani. 35 Peru xeikia haixa muhanetsiemieme meta putsuta hakewa haa matihawa pi'itiyaka xeikia, matsi kemi'ane yeutanaka kaxarieya mikime mimayiani tsepa kemititita ka'itiyati kaniyuhayewamiki. 36 Xika xewiti mikime mikiti ra'imiarita heukaweni, miki hatsi 'itiyati puyuhayewani. 37 Peru xika 'imiari hapa 'utihawiya, xika tixiati timikiti mana tikaweni, ka'itiyakame pirayeitia yumatsika hepaitsita: yu'iwa kaniutewiyatsitiani mikiri yuhutati yunuiwarima mewarexeiyati mepika'akine. 38 Miki tewi tsipu pitatuani makumawetsiepai, miki naime 'axamiti'ane piranutini teiteri memikahakuteitsie paiti. Ne Yawé xekakaiyari nekanihikitini. 39 >>Xika tewa mupitiariekai mitakwanikekaiki hekuwiekaku 'umini, kemi'ane mikime mimayiani, mikita ka'itiyati puyuhayewa kepauka mikiyiretsieke. 40 Kemi'ane miki waiyaririeya mitakwani, miki yukemari piti'ekwa ka'itiyati puyuhayewa kepauka mikiyiretsieke. Kemi'ane menukweni mikita yu'ixurikite piti'ekwa ka'itiyati puyuhayewa kepauka mikiyiretsieke. 41 Keyupaimeti memitexiawe kwiepa yutawima memiteku'uwa meta 'aixia memi'anene xepikawakwa'ani, miki xepiwaxani'erieka. 42 >>>Yutawima memuyukuhapatiwe 43 Xepikatewakwa'ani yutawima mukuyeika, yanitsitini yukitsimeki memu'uwe, yatini waikawa 'ikate memexeiyatika. Xeimetima xepikakwaka yutawima memiteku'uwa miki memika'itiyaki, 44 xepika'ipitiaka mikiki xeka'itiyati xemakineki, miki memika'itiyaki. 45 Ne Yawé xekakaiyari nepihiki, xekeneyupatani xepatsiekame xekeneyuhayewani, ne nemupatsieki. 'Ayumieme xeka'itiyati xepikayuhayewani kwiepa yutawima memiteku'uwa waheki. 46 >>'Iki 'iniari niukiyari kanihikitini: memite'awiwawe wahetsiemieme, yunaime meta hapa memiteye'uwa, meta yunaime yutawima memiteku'uwa, 47 mipai xemiyiwaweniki xemiwamateniki kemi'ane mi'itiya meta mika'itiya, meta kemi'ane memitakwani meta memikatakwa'aniki». 48 Miki Mawari wewiwamete meta 'Aruni 'ipai katiniwarutahiaweki: «'Iki kanihikitini Yawé Muitsexi kemitiutahiawekaiki, 'ixaheritsixi memiyutixexeiriwatsie. 49 Yawé Muitsexi Tsinahi yemuriyaritsie katiniyetuirieni, kepauka memixatianiki. Miki 'arike 'aitsikate kanihikitini Yawé Muitsexi kemitiutahiawekaiki, 'ixaheritsixi memiyutixexeiriwatsie».

Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniuta'aitiani 2 'ixaheritsixi mipai mitiwatahiaweki: «Kepauka 'uka mitihukata meta nunutsi 'ukitime mitiniweni 'atahuta tukari ka'itiyati puyuhayewani, kepauka xuriya miku'axiya hepai. 3 'Atahaika tukari 'aye'ayu 'uki nunutsi xitekiya 'iniariyariki pi'iniaritiarieni. 4 Maamaya puyu'itieka xeitewiyari heimana tamamata heimana haika tukari yuxuriya muhanitsitiakaiki. Tixaiti mitipatsie pikatikumaiwani, meta tukita pikaheutahakeni, kepaukake 'itiya tukari maye'anitsieke. 5 Xika 'ukatime 'utiniweni maamaya ka'itiyati puyuhayewa huta tsemanayari, kepauka xuriya miku'axiyatsie hepai, meta haika tewiyari heimana 'ataxewime tukari puyurieni yu'itieti xuriyaya mutaxiriki. 6 >>Kepaukari maye'ani mi'itiyaniki tukariyari, tsepa nunutsi 'ukitime mutiniwexi yatini xika 'ukatime 'utiniweni, miki xeime muxa panuhana xeiwiyari hikame mawari taiyariyari mayaniki, meta xeime haimi, xeimeta weurai 'itiyari mawariyari mayaniki, mawari wewiwame hetsia piranupini, 'ixuriki tukiyarita miranutahakitiretsie, 7 miki Yawé hixie kanixatiamiki. Mawari wewiwame mixinarieni mawariyari mipai pitiwewieni 'uka hetsiemieme, miki pi'itiyani xuriyaya mutayeuriki. 8 Xika muxa minaneniki ka'i'axeni, yuhutame weuraixi piwaranutiki yatini yuhutame haimixi, xewiti mawari taiyariyari payani xewitita 'itiya mawariyari. Mawari wewiwame mixinarieni mawariyari mipai pitiwewieni 'uka hetsiemieme, miki pi'itiyani». 9 Xika muxa minaneniki ka'i'axeni, yuhutame weuraixi piwaranutiki yatini yuhutame haimixi, miki kemitiyiweni mitiyutuaniki, 10 'Atahaika tukari 'aye'ayu, kemi'ane mi'itiyani, Yawé pitanaki'erieni 'ixuriki tukiyarita miranutahakitiretsie. Miki 'atiyurieme yawixitiki muyu'uwe.
Matsi xeikia wairiyarika ti'uximayatame mawari wewiwame minanai piyiweni mitikwani pikayiweni, meta xewiti mawari wewiwame kiita 'ayekaiti, metatsiere ti'uximayatsiriwame.
Xika mawari wewiwame niweya 'uka xeime mawari wewiwame kahikitime 'utiwitini, pikayiweni mawari memiyetuiriyariwa 'imikieri 'aixia mi'anene mitikwaniki.
Matsi xika kinaya 'umini yatini 'uku'eiriwa nunutsi meka'ayexeiyawaweti, miki punuani yupaapa hetsia yaxeikia muyuxewini hepai, 'ana piyiweni paapaya tita mitikwa'a mitikwaniki.
>>>Xika xewiti 'atsikatimaiti mawari mipatsie 'utikwani, mikita mawari piyetuani 'auxiwimeyaritsie mieme tawari xei'iniariyari kaniyetuamiki.

>>Mawari wewiwamete mawari mipatsie kapatsiekame mepika'ayeitiaka 'ixaheritsixi Yawé memiyetuiriwa, 16 'ayumieme xika memitikwaniki hipame mewarupitiani yuhetsie 'axamiti'ane mepite'ahiani peuyeweka mirayukatuani mawariyari memiyetuaniki. Ne Yawé nekanihikitini nemixepata.

Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniutahiawe 18 'Aruni mipai mitiwatahiaweki meta niwemama meta yunaime 'ixaheritsixi: «Xika xewiti xeme 'ixaheritsixi yatini 'ateewa kiekame 'Ixaheri kwieyaritsie 'ukaiti, Yawé mawari taiyariyari yetuirieni kemutayi raye'atianike yatini kemitiyuwairiya mawariyari,
miki mitanaki'eriwaki tewa 'ukitime 'aixia 'aneme kaniyetuiriemiki, tuuru, muxa, yatini tsipu.

Xeime tewa 'axa'aneme xepika'ixatiaka, mipai 'anekame xepikatanaki'eriyarieni. 21 Xika xewiti, kemutayi miraye'atianiki yatini kemitiyuwairiya mawariyari Yawé yetuirieni tuuru yatini muxa 'aixia memiteyuxeiya mawariyari mayaniki, miki 'aixia pi'aneni mitanaki'eriwaki. 22 Tewaxi yawe mepikayetuiriwani mawari taipa warikariekame mayaniki mekaheunerieme, me'uti'itsaiwame, me'ikamimirime, meheu'etsatikaime, meheuneriitsietikaime, meta haiya xetati kumarikeme wanawiyaritsie mehexeiyame. Mipai me'anenekame mawari taiyametsie xepikawayetuayani.
Kemitiyuwairiya mawariyari mayaniki xeikia xepiyiwaweni xemiyetuaniki xeime tuuru yatini muxa tsepa 'etsihawekame, peru kepemutayi pemiraye'atianil 'atianiki mipai 'aneti mawari pikatanaki'eriwa.

Yawé xeime xepikayetuiriwani memitexuawe 'ipuriteya tiukwinitiarieyu, piratsietikaikaku, haxitekietikaime yatini hatsatsanime. Yukwietsie mipai xepikateyurieka. 25 'Arike muxa piwaxiteni mirayukatuani mawariyari mihiki, 'imikieri 'etsiwa xuriya kwewieme nakaya tserietana miemetsie piwirieni, meta 'itiwameya 'amupayaritsie, meta 'ikayatsie mieme 'amipayari tserietana mieme kemi'ane muyu'itieni hetsie, 26 mawari wewiwame hatseiti mamayatsie muyuhayawaxiki 'etsiwa piwirieni. 27 Meta yu'itiwame yutserieta miemeki 'atahutamexia pi'iya, Yawé hixie. 28 Meta kemi'ane muyu'itieni mawari wewiwame hatseiti mamayatsie kemi'ane muyu'itieni mu'uyatsie pikawirieni, Mipai miki mixinarieni mawariyari pitiwewieni Yawé hixie kemi'ane miyu'itieni».

Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniutahiawe 30 'ixaheritsixi mipai mitiwatahiaweki: «Xika xewiti 'uki yatini 'uka mikite wahamatia tikuxatani meta hipame 'iyarite muwakihiawe, miki kanimieriemiki. Tetexiki tituaxiexiame kanimimiki, hetsiena mitinakekaiki mumierieniki».

Yawé Muitsexi katiniuta'aitiani 2 'ixaheritsixi mipai mitiwatahiaweki: <<<'Iki 'ixiararite pihiki ne nemixe'utawewiri, xeme xemiwakuxaxatiwaniki patsiekameki memuyukuxexeiriwaniki nehetsiemieme. Ne Yawé 'iki nemixe'utiwewiriki.

>>'Ataxewime tukari xeikia xepite'uximayaka, matsi 'atahutarieka tukariyaritsie 'uxipiya tukari kanihikitikamiki, miki tukaritsie 'ixiarari patsiekameki memuyukuxexeiriwa nehetsiemieme pihikitini, 'ana tixaitikitima xepikate'uximayaka. Tsepa xeme hakewa xemetiteni, xawati kanipatsiekamiki Yawé hetsiemieme.
>>'Iki 'ixiararite kanihikitsixitini Yawé mixe'utawewiri, patsiekameki memuyukux- exeiriwa hetsiemieme xeme xepikuxatani xexuiti tukari mika'iniaritikatsie:
>>Patsikwa Yawé hetsiemieme tamamata heimana naurieka tukayaritsie putsuti mexiakame metseriyaritsie tau makayunetsieke.
Tamamata heimana 'auxiwirieka tukari 'aye'ayu miki metseriyaritsie paa mikakuxanariyarietika 'ixiarariyari kanitsutini Yawé hetsiemieme. 'Atahuta tukari paa mikakuxanariyarietika xepikwaka.
Mexiakame tukaritsie mepiwewieni 'ixiarari patsiekameki memuyukuxexeiriwa hetsiena mieme, miki tukaritsie tixaitikitima xepikate'uximayaka.

'Atahuta tukari Yawé 'imikieri taipa warikariekame xekaniwewiriekakuni, 'atahutarieka tukaritsie 'ixiarari patsiekameki memuyukuxexeiriwa hetsiena mieme xekaniwewikuni, miki tukaritsie tixaitikitima xepikate'uximayaka».
Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniuta'aitiani,

'ixaheritsixi mipai mitiwatahiaweki: «Kepauka xeme xemeutahaxiani kwie nemixeyetuirienitsie, meta tiriku xemika'itsanatsie, mawari wewiwame hetsia xeimanukuyari xekananukweikuni matiari mitiharieni mika'itsanatsie mieme.
Mawari wewiwame tiriku 'anahiakame 'imikieriyari teiki kanetseramiki 'iyuitiwati Yawé hixie mitanaki'eriyarieniki. Xawatiki 'anutiyayu 'uxa'arieka ximeri miyetuaniki.
'Ana kwiti miki tukaritsie xeime muxa xekanitimawakuni xeiwiyari hikame, 'aixia 'aneme, mawari taiyariyari Yawé hetsiemieme mayaniki.

Meta xepiyetuirieni nauka kiruyari tiriku mitixiyari 'aixia mi'ane hatseiti pinariekame, tiriku mawariyari mayaniki, 'imikieri taipa warikariekame witsimu'ia Yawé minake, meta xeirituruyari kaxie winuyari yetuame kanitiyeurimiki.
Paa xepikatikwani meta 'uriyari xarikiyari meta mihehekwa kepauka miki 'imikieri yukakaiyari xemi'atiirienitsieke.

Paa yukie mieme Yawé xekani'atiiriekuni, teiki hetserarieti 'uyuitiariwati mawariyari mayaniki matiari mitiukaxuawerixi, paa hutame nauka kiruyari tiriku mitixiyari 'aixia mi'ane wewiyatikaime, tikuxanariyameki kwaxiyariekame.

Meta 'atahutame muxatsi 'ukitsi xepiwayetuani paa nikame xeiwiyari mehitikaime 'aixia me'aneneme, xeime tsikeru meta yuhutame muxatsi 'ukitsi. Mawari teyari meta kaxie winuyari mitiyeuriyani mawariyari yinikame, xeime mawari taiyariyari Yawé hetsiemieme, witsimu'ia Yawé minake.
Hiki tsipu 'uki xekanitimawakuni 'axaxemite'uyuri mawariyari mayaniki, meta yuhutame muxatsi xeiwiyari mehitikaime kememiteyuxewi mawariyari mayaniki.
Mawari wewiwame muxatsi memuyuhuta teiki kaniwaretseramiki 'iyuitiwati, meta paa matiari mieme heutinikame.
Miki mawari 'uyuitiariwati Yawé hixie miyetuiwaki, mawari mipatsie Yawé hetsiemieme meta mawari wewiwame hetsiemieme pirayani.

'Ana kwiti miki tukaritsie, xeme xekaniyukuxeirikuni 'ixiarari patsiekame Yawé hetsiemieme xewewienike, miki tukaritsie tixaitiki xepikate'uximayaka. 'Iki kanihikitikamiki 'aitsika yuheyemeki yamemiteyuriekaki yunaiti 'anuiwarima, tsepa hakewa memetiteni.
Xika xewiti kayuhakieni miki yuteiterima watsata payeweiyarieni.

>>Kepauka 'itsanaxa tukari maye'ani, naime tetsitanapai xepika'itsanatiweni meta muyukuhayeikawa naime xepikayeteixirimeni. Xekenekuhayeikawani tixaiti memikatehexeiya meta 'ateewa kiekatari wahetsiemieme mirayaniki. Ne Yawé xekakaiyari nekanihikitini».

Yawé Muitsexi katiniuta'aitiani 24 'ixaheritsixi mipai mitiwatahiaweki: <<Mexiakame tukaritsie 'atahuta metseriyaritsie 'ana xeme 'uxipiya xepexeiyani, xeme'eriwaniki kuxineta pukayuaneni, xeme miki tukaritsie kuxineta 'ixiarari patsiekameki memuyukuxexeiriwa Yawé hetsiemieme.
Miki tukaritsie tixaitiki xepikate'uximayaka, matsi pita Yawé 'imikieri taipa warikariekame xekateniyetuiriekakuni». Kemireuyehiwiyarieni tukariyari

Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniuta'aitiani 27 <<Tamamata tukaritsie 'atahuta metseriyaritsie xemiteheuyehiwiyariwa 'ana tukariyari pihikitini. 'Ixiarari patsiekameki memuyukux- exeiriwa Yawé hetsiemieme xekaniwewiekuni, meta xekaniyuhakiekuni meta 'imikieri taipa warikariekame xekaniyetuiriekuni. 28 Miki tukaritsie tixaitiki xepikate'uximayaka mireuyehiwiyarieni tukariyari mihikiki, kepauka Yawé xekakaiyari hixie 'itiya mawariyari mukuwewiwaki xehetsiemieme. 29 Xika xewiti kayuhakieni miki yuteiterima watsata payeweiyarieni. 30 Xika xewiti tiuta'uximayata miki tukaritsie, ne nekimana kiekarieyatsie nekanenuyehiamiki. 31 'Ayumieme, xeme tixaitiki xepikate'uximayaka. 'Iki 'aitsika yuheyemeki kanihikitikamiki yaxemitekahuniki yunaiti xenuiwaritsie kanimiemetini, tsepa hakewa xemetiteni. 32 Miki 'uxipiya tukari xehetsiemieme payani xemeyexeiyaniki, meta xekaniyuhakiekakuni. Miki xawati 'atanauka tukariyari taikaiyaritsie xepitsutiani miki metseriyaritsie 'uxa'arieka taikaiyaritsie paiti». Xamaru matiwewiwa 'ixiarapa mieme 33 Yawé Muitsexi katiniuta'aitiani 34 'ixaheritsixi mipai mitiwatahiaweki: <<Tamamata heimana 'auxiwirieka tukaritsie 'atahuta metseriyaritsie, xekanitsutiakuni Xamaru 'ixiarariyari Yawé hetsiemieme, miki 'atahuta tukari xekaniyurikini. 35 Mexiakame tukaritsie 'ixiarari patsiekameki memuyukuxexeiriwa Yawé hetsiemieme xekaniwewikuni. Miki tukaritsie tixaitiki xepikate'uximayaka. 36 'Atahutamexia tukari Yawé 'imikieri taipa kwaxiyariekame xekaniyetuiriekakuni. 'Atahairieka tukari 'ixiarari patsiekameki memuyukuxexeiriwa xekaniwewikuni Yawé hetsiemieme meta tawari mawari 'imikieri taipa warikariekame xekaniyetuiriekuni. 'Ixiarari patsiekameki memuyukuxexeiriwa kanihikitini. Miki tukaritsie tixaitiki xepikate'uximayaka. 37 >>'Iki 'ixiararite kanihikitini Yawé mixe'utawewiri, xeme xemikuxataniki patsiekameki memuyukuxexeiriwa Yawé hetsiemieme, xemiyetuirieniki mawari 'imikieri taipa warikariekame, mawari taiyariyari, tiriku mawariyari, meta mawarite meta kaxie winuyari mitiyeuriwa mawariyari, kemireku'ukaiki maye'atiarieniki xexuime tukaritsie. 38 'Iki naiti 'ixiararite xawati tukariyaritsie kanixeitaparitini Yawé tukari 'uxipiyayatsie ketemite'umikiwa, kepemiti'ahiritia mawariyari, yanutsu kepemiti'awairiya mawariyari xeme xemiyetuirie. 39 >>Tamamata heimana 'auxiwirieka tukariyaritsie 'atahuta metseriyaritsie, kwiepa 'ikwaxite mitiutixuawerixi xetekuxeiriemeri, 'atahuta tukari Yawé hetsiemieme xekaniwewikuni. Mexiakame tukaritsie meta 'atahairieka tukariyaritsie 'uxipiya tukari kanihikitini. 40 Mexiakame tukariyaritsie, katinitipimiki 'iteirite 'aixia mi'anenetsie timieme, taki xawariyari, meta 'iteiri xawariyari mi'etiriwiwe, meta hapuri 'aki 'utia muxuawe, 'atahuta tukari xekaniyutemamawiekakuni Yawé xekakaiyari hixie. 41 Xeiwiyari 'aye'axekaku, 'atahutarieka tukari xekanitiwewiwakuni 'iki 'ixiarari Yawé hetsiemieme. 'Atahutarieka metseriyaritsie xekanitiwewiwakuni. 'Iki 'aitsika kanihikitikamiki yuheyemeki mumieme 'aixia mi'ane nuiwarite 'umemahu wahetsiemieme. 42 'Atahuta tukari mekaniyuriekuni xamaru kiiyarita me'ayeteti. Yunaiti 'ixaheritsixi mana memutinunuiwaxi xamarutia mekanayetekuni, 43 wanuiwarite yamemitehetimaniki kename ne xamaru mipai 'anenemeta newareutayatsaxi 'ixaheritsixi kepauka 'Ekipitu nemiwarayewititsie. Ne Yawé xekakaiyari nekanihikitini». 44 Mipai Muitsexi 'ixaheritsixi katiniwarutahekiatiani Yawé 'ixiararite kemitiutawewiekaiki.

Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniutahiawe: 2 <<<'Ixaheritsixi mipai ketiniwaruta'aitia huriwa hatseitiyari hikiameki pinariekame memimatsi'atiirieniki, tukita muyehekiakaki. Mipai kixeme yuheyemeki pitatikani. 3 'Aruni 'ixuriki tukiyarita kixemete kanikuha'aritamiki, 'ixuriki meuwie hixie Kakaiyari tiratuya miwayekatsie, tikariki mitakaki Yawé hixie. 'Iki 'aitsika yuheyemeki payani xenuiwarite 'umemahu wahetsiemieme. 4 Kixemete, kixeme 'uitiwameta huruki yuheyemeki miwewiyatikata 'uyewetikaiti pitatikani Yawé hixie. Yawé paa kemitiyetuiriyariwa 5 >>Tiriku mitixiyari 'aixia mi'ane kenewatituka keneutikwaxiya huxunuta tamamata heimana huta tsuirayari. Xexuiti miki nauka kiruyari piraheteni. 6 Yawé hixie kenamana mexa huruki xeikia miwewiyatsie, hutakia 'ataxewime payari xexuimetsie 'anuyemanetikaime. 7 Xexuime xurukuyaritsie 'ikwa witsimu'ia hikiakame pepeutamanatiyani. Mipai paa ma'eriwa mawariyari Yawé muxatiarie taipa warikariekame kanihikitikamiki. 8 'Iki paa Yawé kaniyetuiriyariwamiki yuheyemeki xawatiki. 'Iki kanihikitini 'aitsika 'aixia mi'ane 'ixaheritsixi kaniwahetsiemiemetini. 9 Miki paa 'Aruni hetsiemieme pihiki meta niwemama, miki muyepatsietsie mepitikwani. Mawarika yamipaime waikawa mipatsie mihikiki Yawé muxatiarie mawari taipa warikariekame. Miki 'aitsika yuheyemeki 'aixia mi'ane kanihikitini yaxemitekahuniki». 'Axame'utiyuati kememitekwi'iwani 10 'Ixaheritsixi watsata xewiti tewi puyeikakai maamaya 'Ixaheri tewiyari pihikitikai, paapayata 'ekipitutanaka tihikitikai. Hiki heiwa miki tewi 'ixaheri tewiyari hamatia mematiteitsie 'imieri mekaniutsutiani. 11 Matsi 'ukaratsi 'ixaheri tewiyari nu'aya, 'axatayinike, Yawé 'utateriwati hepaitsitana 'axakaniutayini, hiki Muitsexi hetsia mekaneihana. (Maamaya Tserumiti katinitewakaitini Riwiri niweya, Rani nuiwarieyatiti). 12 Hiki kananutahiiyani kepaukake Yawé yamitiwatahiawekekai kememiyurienikekaiki. 13 Hiki Yawé Muitsexi mipai katiniutahiawe: 14 <<'Axatiniukame xematiteitsie xekenayeni'a. Kemi'ane memi'eni miki yumamaki mu'uyatsie mekeheutimeni meta memuyuxeirie yunaiti mekanitituaxixiakuni. 15 Mipai 'ixaheritsixi ketiniwaretahiawi: "Kemi'ane 'axamitayini yukakaiyari hepaitsita, katinika'enieximiki 'axakememitiuyuriki". 16 Yaxeikiata, kemi'ane Yawé kemititewaki mitateriwa yuhepai tewi 'axatitahiaweke kanimieriemiki. Memuyutixexeiriwa yunaiti mekanitituaxixiakuni. Tsepaneti 'ateewa mikiekame yatini mana munuiwame, xika Yawé 'utateriwa yuhepai tewi hepaitsita 'axatayinike. Miki kanimieriemiki. 17 'Iniari niukiyari tewi kemitiuhiritiarie 18 >>Kemi'ane xeime tewi mimieni, mikita kanimieriemiki. 19 Xika xewiti xeime tewatsiekame 'umieni, xeime tewa kanikihiamiki. 20 Xika xeime 'umeya 'akamura mikita 'umeya ke'akamuriyarieni, Xika xeime hixieya watituni mikita hixieya kewatituiyani, xika tameya 'anaye'una mikita tameya ke'anaye'uniyarieni, pitiuka'eniwani yuwaiyaritsie ketitaki miyamitiuyuriki. 21 >>Kemi'ane tewatsiekame mumieni xeime kaniyetuamiki mimiki, matsi kemi'ane tewi mumieni mikita kanimieriemiki. 22 Yuxewiti 'iniari niukiyari katinita'aitamiki, 'ena nuiwakame meta 'ateewa kiekame wahetsie. Ne Yawé xekakaiyari nekanihikitini». 23 Muitsexi 'iki naime 'ixaheritsixi katini- warutaxatiani, 'axatiniukame memakuteitsie mekanayeni'ani, mana mekaneitituaxixiani. Yawé Muitsexi kemitiuta'aitiakai 'ixaheritsixi mipai mekateniuyurieni.
